__e: All my life I have worked, and all that time I have lived in debt.

(It is said to the people of Hell): “Are these they about whom you swore that Allah will not reach with His mercy”? (And it is said to the people of Heaven): “Enter Heaven! There is no fear on you nor do you grieve”.
One fellow's brave because he doesn't know what fear is. The other fellow's brave because he's afraid and fights it and doesn't show it.
I want to escape so to live in the fear of God. I want to be a good wife, and a mother.
The fear of God is not before their eyes.
A man must know awe, and fear God
It's for fear of what you could do to my daughter.
in fear of what my life and my children’s lives may be,
People are afraid to go out at night for fear of being robbed or killed.
I can quite safely say that I think your taste in clothing is absolutely terrible
"I am extremely concerned for fear your reputation should be exposed. "
That was my decision, Bill. I only got you out of here because I was afraid you'd be hurt... killed. Killed?
Sir, I'll see that he leaves immediately.
If I must fear and dread, I must seize you and learn all!
In that case, sir, I fear I must give my notice.
Now, there's nothing to be nervous about.
If you keep your word and let his men go free, I have nothing to fear.
You can go without fear, at all hours, there is no danger in the city.
And unto man he said, Behold, the fear of the LORD, that is wisdom; and to depart from evil is understanding.
All my life I trod the straight and narrow for fear of God Almighty... and what did it get me but a broken heart?
- With the help of God. In the fear of God. At the service of God.
